author: jstrachan
msg: Now deprecated the getServiceDiscovery() method on ServiceDiscovery.
Now using a static newInstance() instead which follows the JAXP naming conventions, and makes it more clear that its not returning a singleton.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added a simple index page used for the Maven-generated website

author: jstrachan
msg: Patch so that ServiceInfo objects are actually returned by ServiceDiscovery :-)
The ServiceInfo objects were not being added to the results.

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched logging version number so that commons-discovery compiles with Maven
